attributes.title: This app made my fish drown
attributes.review:
So I downloaded this app to keep up with the news and all that jazz and I was sitting next to my fish tank and I noticed my fish was staring at my phone screen and i began noticing that he was getting bigger and bigger until he blew up and I got fish guts all over me. I guess he couldnt stand the ugly face of the idiot we call a president. (Also save Barron)
